text:
Wow! <@U7SL518D6> <@U2H3TT8F2> <@U26B530N6> I was playing around with the VueJs boilerplate, installed axios and used some external endpoints, and the module works smoothly on the page.
Congrats to all the HubSpot team. The most I get involved in every development aspect of the HB ecosystem, the most I enjoy it.

Glad you’re loving it Ilich!

let us know as you use it if you find anything confusing or think something could be done better.

We really want to make sure it’s delivering a top notch experience.
cc: <@UQ4ED6QFM>
For sure, I'll let you know
